Text:
How do I get this to work in VLC?
it gives me this error...
main: option sub-original-fps does not exist
using vlc 0.8.5 for mac
It wont work on anything!! what kind of crap is this?
what do you recommend using to play such file??

ABSOLUTELY works....you just have to do a little digging:

First, you need HDTVPump:

http://www.dvbportal.de/projects/hdtvpump/

And then (At least for any HD-DVD releases by HDTV_CHINA i have) you need Matroska Splitter

http://haali.cs.msu.ru/mkv/

You will also need to have a MPEG2 decoder previously installed. NVIDIA's works. If you can play a DVD - chances are you have a valid decoder.


Install those and report back!

KMPlayer to play HD from HDTV CHINA
http://kmplayer.kde.org/download.php

If you download those 3 and install them all downloads from HDTV CHINA will work Have downloaded 40 and all works
Or you can just use Nero ShowTime, or probaably any high def DVD player.  The quality is almost worth the 40gb...
wtf go download the latest powerdvd 8 then come and bitch. there is shit loads even nero 8's has the ability and for gods sake i hope u ppl arent using 1 year old computers.
